channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: How a government shutdown would unfold
item.description: The threat of a government shutdown has become a recurring event in Washington. Another one of those moments has arrived as the beginning of the fiscal year approaches Wednesday.

item.title: Man who opened fire on ICE facility hoped attack would give agents ‘real terror,’ FBI says
Deadly shooting on Dallas ICE office reflects widely varying security levels
